title: Decades Later, Laurie Colwin's Books 'Will Not Let You Down'
teaser: A digital publisher has released a bounty of Colwin's books: four novels, three short-story collections and a collection of cooking essays. Colwin, who died in 1992 at age 48, had an "elusive magic."
